message.body: Hey! So josh and I aren't coming the last weekend of nov. I really want to hang out/see you soon. I am free thanksgiving and days after, but I know you have family-friends that require a lot of your time. Anyway, i would love to still see you, even if that's helping you prepare dinner for this family. Let me know. If not, soon for sure
Ok!! Yes, I always make dinner for our family friends, but I can definitely spend the day with you, and the following day as well. It would be great to see you!
And you can certainly sleep at my place, obviously.
It is actually kind of nice!
And I will be your su- chef (sp) while you are preparing! I'll help you with everything and hope to learn some stuff!

So, I'm realizing now that I have to travel to Milwaukee for work right after thanksgiving. Just got back from there too. I can't afford to have dogs taken care of for that long, so I can't visit on thanksgiving, but def soon!
How is the new job!?? How exciting!
